entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of showers this afternoon with risk of a thunderstorm. Snow level 1000 metres. Wind east 20 km/h becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 this afternoon. High 12. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PDT Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clearing. Low minus 1 with patchy frost.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 1 with patchy frost. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PDT Tuesday 18 April 2023
